alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 21 at 6:26PM MDT until April 22 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT FOR AREAS MAINLY SOUTH OF HIGHWAY 40... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow amounts through the evening. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches with storm total amounts 3 to 6 inches south of Highway 40. . * WHERE...Central Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on icy to snow-packed road conditions developing after sunset. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will mainly be south of Highway 40 in the vicinity of Meeker.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
